about_the_game:
Portobugia is a management/survival/inspection game where you manage a port and must supply a city with goods and food. To do so you must unload boats, but, be careful, some of them could be infected! You will also face difficult events, to fight them, you can upgrade, construct and research!

What happened!?

After the First World War, Eastern Europe has fallen into chaos... Bugs are eating all the crops, spreading diseases, and bandits are everywhere... There is no government to bring peace to the region which means cities must survive by themselves...

Inspect boats!

When a boat arrives in your port, you must inspect it before unloading or refusing it. You must verify the report by looking at the boat and comparing it to the report. If you correctly verify the report you will get some rewards. But if you don't pay attention enough attention to the infection, you will have problems with bugs that will eat some of your resources!

Manage your port!

You start with a very basic port, but this port will not be enough to survive in this post-WWI world. You must quickly develop your infrastructure if you want to last (and the city to survive). Construct new buildings, upgrade the ones you already have, or research new technologies! You can also hire employees to increase your building’s efficiency, but they will ask for a daily income. And don't forget to send some resources to the city, otherwise your citizens will die!

The world will not be kind!

You will need to be ready for all sorts of events that could happen in your port! One bad shipment could spell your doom! Prepare yourself for hard times, winter will be harsh!

Scenarios!

You will have multiple scenarios to achieve! Each scenario has its own specificities! Their goals and difficulties are different! For example, in the Battleship scenario, you will need to construct a battleship using two resources only available in this scenario: Steel sheets and Oil.

Key features

  • Boat inspections: inspect boats for any insects in them before unloading them!

  • Random events: you'll have to make toughs decisions to save the city!

  • Buildings: construct buildings and unlock more choices for survival!

  • Upgrades: upgrade your buildings to improve their efficiency!

  • Employees: recruit or fire employees to manage your buildings' efficiency!

  • Resources management: Pay attention to your resources, the city needs daily shipments of food and goods!

  • Technologies: research technologies to unlock upgrades and new buildings!

  • Artifacts: search on ships for precious artifacts! Once collected, you can sell them or inspect them for knowledge!

  • Scenarios: discover multiple missions with their own goals and difficulties! From the rough Siberia to a Military Dockyard!

  • Morale: your people will strike if you make bad decisions!
